thread.section_title: The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location and breakfast
thread.title_full: Location and breakfast - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: hassan a
title: Location and breakfast
text: I stayed at this hotel with my wife and my two teen age kids. Great location, very good experience and will recommend this hotel to my friends and will stay here again and again. The hotel was very reasonable in price with breakfast included which was served by these two nice and friendly guys at the barista, Mohammed and Dolly.
